get.description: Returns a list with a single organization associated with the API key in the request.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

get.description: Returns details of a single organization. In order to get the details, the auth key must belong to the organization.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

patch.description: Updates organization fields. Requires ADMIN auth key role.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization to update.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

get.description: Returns a list of all services in the organization.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

post.description: Creates a new service in the organization, and returns the current service state and a password to access the service. The service is started asynchronously.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that will own the service.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

get.description: Returns a service that belongs to the organization

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the requested service.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

patch.description: Updates basic service details like service name or IP access list.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the service to update.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

delete.description: Deletes the service. The service must be in stopped state and is deleted asynchronously after this method call.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the service to delete.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the service to update state.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

patch.description: Updates minimum and maximum total memory limits and idle mode scaling behavior for the service. The memory settings are available only for "production" services and must be a multiple of 12 starting from 24GB.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the service to update scaling parameters.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

patch.description: Sets a new password for the service

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the service to update password.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

get.description: Returns a list of all backups for the service.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the backup.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the service the backup was created from.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the backup.

parameters.name: Service ID
parameters.description: ID of the service the backup was created from.

parameters.name: Service backup ID
parameters.description: ID of the requested backup.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

parameters.description: ID of the organization to invite a user to.

get.description: Returns a single organization activity by ID.

parameters.name: Organization ID
parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

parameters.name: Activity ID
parameters.description: ID of the requested activity.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

description.description: IPv4 address or IPv4 CIDR to allow access from

tier.description: Tier of the service: 'development', 'production', 'dedicated_high_mem', 'dedicated_high_cpu', 'dedicated_standard'. Production services scale, Development are fixed size.

minTotalMemoryGb.description: Minimum total memory of all workers during auto-scaling in Gb. Available only for 'production' services. Must be a multiple of 12 and greater than 24.

maxTotalMemoryGb.description: Maximum total memory of all workers during auto-scaling in Gb. Available only for 'production' services. Must be a multiple of 12 and lower than 360 for non paid services or 720 for paid services.

idleScaling.description: When set to true the service is allowed to scale down to zero when idle. Always true for development services.

idleTimeoutMinutes.description: Set minimum idling timeout (in minutes). Must be >= 5 minutes.

ipAccessList.description: List of IP addresses allowed to access the service

add.description: Elements to add. Executed after "remove" part is processed.

remove.description: Elements to remove. Executed before "add" part is processed.

actorIpAddress.description: IP address of the actor. Defined for 'user' and 'api' actor types.

organizationId.description: Scope of the activity: organization ID this activity is related to.

serviceId.description: Scope of the activity: service ID this activity is related to.

finishedAt.description: Backup finish timestamp. ISO-8601. Available only for finished backups

createdAt.description: The timestamp the organization was created. ISO-8601.

userId.description: Unique user ID. If a user is a member in multiple organizations this ID will stay the same.

name.description: Name of the member as set a personal user profile.

email.description: Email of the member as set in personal user profile.

role.description: Role of the member in the organization.

joinedAt.description: Timestamp the member joined the organization. ISO-8601.

role.description: Role of the member in the organization.

email.description: Email of the invited user. Only a user with this email can join using the invitation. The email is stored in a lowercase form.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the key. Contains at least 1 element.

createdAt.description: Timestamp the key was created. ISO-8601.

expireAt.description: Timestamp the key expires. If not present or is empty the key never expires. ISO-8601.

usedAt.description: Timestamp the key was used last time. If not present the key was never used. ISO-8601.

keyIdSuffix.description: Last 4 digits of the key ID. Algorithm: echo -n "yourpassword" | sha256sum | tr -d '-' | xxd -r -p | base64

keySecretHash.description: Hash of the key secret. Algorithm: echo -n "yourpassword" | sha256sum | tr -d '-' | xxd -r -p | base64

tier.description: Tier of the service: 'development', 'production', 'dedicated_high_mem', 'dedicated_high_cpu', 'dedicated_standard'. Production services scale, Development are fixed size.

ipAccessList.description: List of IP addresses allowed to access the service

minTotalMemoryGb.description: Minimum total memory of all workers during auto-scaling in Gb. Available only for 'production' services. Must be a multiple of 12 and greater than 24.

maxTotalMemoryGb.description: Maximum total memory of all workers during auto-scaling in Gb. Available only for 'production' services. Must be a multiple of 12 and lower than 360 for non paid services or 720 for paid services.

idleScaling.description: When set to true the service is allowed to scale down to zero when idle. Always true for development services.

idleTimeoutMinutes.description: Set minimum idling timeout (in minutes). Must be >= 5 minutes.

backupId.description: Optional backup ID used as an initial state for the new service. When used the region and the tier of the new instance must be the same as the values of the original instance.

password.description: Password for the newly created service.

minTotalMemoryGb.description: Minimum total memory of all workers during auto-scaling in Gb. Available only for 'production' services. Must be a multiple of 12 and greater than 24.

maxTotalMemoryGb.description: Maximum total memory of all workers during auto-scaling in Gb. Available only for 'production' services. Must be a multiple of 12 and lower than 360 for non paid services or 720 for paid services.

idleScaling.description: When set to true the service is allowed to scale down to zero when idle. Always true for development services.

idleTimeoutMinutes.description: Set minimum idling timeout (in minutes). Must be >= 5 minutes.

newPasswordHash.description: Optional password hash. Used to avoid password transmission over network. If not provided a new password is generated and is provided in the response. Otherwise this hash is used. Algorithm: echo -n "yourpassword" | sha256sum | tr -d '-' | xxd -r -p | base64

newDoubleSha1Hash.description: Optional double SHA1 password hash for MySQL protocol. If newPasswordHash is not provided this key will be ignored and the generated password will be used. To enable this field please contact support as it is experimental. Algorithm: echo -n "yourpassword" | sha1sum | tr -d '-' | xxd -r -p | sha1sum | tr -d '-'

password.description: New service password. Provided only if there was no 'newPasswordHash' in the request

expireAt.description: Timestamp the key expires. If not present or is empty the key never expires. ISO-8601.

state.description: Initial state of the key: 'enabled', 'disabled'. If not provided the new key will be 'enabled'.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the key. Contains at least 1 element.

keyId.description: Generated key ID. Provided only if there was no 'hashData' in the request.

keySecret.description: Generated key secret. Provided only if there was no 'hashData' in the request.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the key. Contains at least 1 element.

expireAt.description: Timestamp the key expires. If not present or is empty the key never expires. ISO-8601.

role.description: Role of the member in the organization.

email.description: Email of the invited user. Only a user with this email can join using the invitation. The email is stored in a lowercase form.

role.description: Role of the member in the organization.
